New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his 51st home run of the season
Shohei Ohtani went 6-for-6 with three home runs, ten RBI and two stolen bases
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning
Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning
Los Angeles Dodgers won 20-4 against Miami Marlins
Post-Match Reflections: MLB commissioner Rob Manfred congratulated Shohei Ohtani on his remarkable achievement
Miscellaneous Highlights: Los Angeles Dodgers secured their place in the playoffs in just 91 games played
